channel.title: Metasequoia help please (dunno if this is correct section)
channel.description: Hello I'm currently making my own model's using Metasequoia, But i would like to know, how do i change color's??? Becuase i've made a sword but there is no color, How would i add it?? Please could anybody help

item.title: Metasequoia help please (dunno if this is correct section)
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

wrong section, should be in client help, but here it is.

in the toolbar at the top click “panel” then “material panel”

press new, then prop.

set colour there. press ok.

now in the bar on the left press “mat”, which is in the list “face”

now you click on the faces you want coloured

Read full topic
item.source: Metasequoia help please (dunno if this is correct section)
